label: Data Collection
description: Collect all required customer information including personal details, site address, Aadhaar, PAN, electric bill, and solar plant requirements. Upload all supporting documents before proceeding.

label: Registration
description: Complete the official registration process for the solar application. Submit application form, feasibility form, e-token document, and net metering document to the relevant authorities.

label: Finance Registration
description: Register the customer's solar plant application with the finance partner. Upload the quotation document and obtain the digital approval letter from the finance company.

label: Submit Finance to Bank
description: Submit all finance-related documents to the bank for processing. Ensure the quotation and approval documents are complete and accurate before submission.

label: COT Request
description: Process the Change of Tenancy (COT) request for the customer. Gather COT-specific documents including death certificate, house papers, passport photo, family registration, and live Aadhaar copies.

label: Name Correction Request
description: Process the name correction request on the electricity connection. Verify the correct name in all identity documents and submit the correction request to the electrical department.

label: Load Enhancement Request
description: Submit a request to enhance the sanctioned load on the electricity connection to meet the solar plant requirements. Coordinate with the electrical department for approval.

label: Indent Creation
description: Create the hard copy indent document listing all equipment and materials required for the solar plant installation. Upload the signed indent document for further processing.

label: Submit Indent to Electrical Dept
description: Submit the created indent document to the electrical department for sanctioning. Track the submission status and follow up for timely approval.

label: Meter Installation
description: Coordinate and oversee the installation of the net meter by the electrical department at the customer's site. Verify the meter is correctly installed and operational.

label: Payment Collection
description: Collect the remaining payment amount from the customer after deducting any advance payments. Issue a receipt and upload proof of payment.

label: Payment Approval
description: Review and approve the payment collection record submitted by the field team. Verify the payment amount matches the outstanding balance before approval.

label: Bill Generation
description: Generate the final payment bill (paybill) for the customer. Upload the bill document and ensure it reflects the correct amount including all charges.

label: Create CDR
description: Create the Customer Data Record (CDR) in the system to document the complete transaction and installation details for billing and subsidy purposes.

label: Installation Approval
description: Review and approve the plant installation request. Verify site feasibility, equipment list, and technician assignment before granting approval to proceed with installation.

label: Plant Installation
description: Execute the physical installation of the solar plant at the customer's site. Record installation date, assign technicians and technical assistants, and designate a photo taker for documentation.

label: Take Installation Photos
description: Capture clear photographs of all installed solar equipment including panels, inverter, mounting structure, and wiring. Photos must show serial number labels and installation quality.

label: Upload Serial Numbers
description: Upload the serial numbers of all installed equipment (solar panels, inverter, mounting brackets) into the system for warranty and record-keeping purposes.

label: Inspection
description: Conduct a thorough technical inspection of the installed solar plant. Verify correct wiring, safety compliance, panel orientation, inverter configuration, and net meter connectivity.

label: Apply Subsidy
description: Submit the subsidy application to the relevant government portal (PM Surya Ghar / state scheme). Upload all required documents and track the application status.

label: Subsidy Redemption
description: Process the redemption of the approved subsidy amount. Coordinate with the bank and government portal to ensure the subsidy is credited to the customer's account.

label: Assign QA
description: Assign a Quality Assurance (QA) representative to conduct a final quality check of the solar installation. Ensure the QA team member has access to all installation documents.

label: Quality Assurance
description: Perform a comprehensive quality assurance check of the entire solar plant installation. Verify system performance, safety standards, documentation completeness, and customer satisfaction.

label: Submit Warranty Document
description: Prepare and submit all warranty documents for the installed equipment to the SFDC system. Include product warranties, installation warranty, and AMC details if applicable.

label: Document Handover
description: Hand over all original documents to the customer including registration certificate, inspection report, warranty cards, subsidy acknowledgement, and any other official paperwork.
